name: Rose of Dragontail
description:
Slap the bandits out of Dragontail village! Swing your thicc dragon tail to soften them up, then either knock them flying or grab and throw them into each other.

Controls Action
Controller (recommended)
Keyboard
Move, point grabbed enemy
Left Stick
Arrows
Tail swing
Xbox X button, PS Square buttonZGrab stunned enemy
Hold Xbox A button or PS X button, and walk into kneeling enemy
Hold XRelease grabbed enemy
Release Grab buttonRelease X
Pause game
PauseRestart game

F2
